title: What are the requirements to join the OPL?
body: I've done a quick search but I haven't found my answers. What are the age requirements, team requirements, locations, etc.?

replies.body:
Hello!
Let me try and answer some of your questions!

1) The minimum age to join the OPL as a pro-player is 17years old.
2) 3 out of 5 Starter players must be residents of an Oceanic Country. A resident is defined as a player that has lived in an Oceanic country for 24 of the last 36 months.

Maybe expand further what you mean by "team requirements"? That can mean a bunch of different things.

99! definitely 99! if you are a 100 years old, i'm sorry, someone who is a century old is ancient.
